message.content:
{"id": "124570", 
"title": "Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session", 
"description": "Whenever I click on the Preview button in the toolbar, it always displays the first report that I opened in the session. This issue occurs consistently.", 
"OB": "Click on the Preview button in the toolbar.", 
"EB": "Open Sales Invoice and click on the Preview button again. The actual result is that the Product Catalog report is displayed again, instead of the expected Sales Invoice report.", 
"SR": "The toolbar Preview button should display the report that corresponds to the currently active screen, not the first report opened in the session."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '124570', 'title': 'Bug 124570Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session', 'description': 'Bug 124570Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'Open Sales Invoice and click on the Preview button again.Actual Result: You see the Product Catalog report again.Expected Result: You should see the Sales Invoice report.
